description:
Enabling cross-platform application and game development

HARMAN have taken over the development and support for the Adobe AIR SDK, a cross-platform framework used by a wide range of applications and games. Enabling rapid development including animations created via Adobe Animate, AIR supports the deployment of applications on desktop and mobile platforms, including the ability to develop and deploy iPhone and iPad applications using a Windows machine.
AIR-7542: Windows StageWebView fails if main window is destroyed
Github-2505: Ensuring it's possible to seek(0) from a video metadata callback
